<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="text-transform: uppercase">13.</FONT>
<B>&#35821;&#35328;&#21644;&#21103;&#26412;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36.15pt"><B>Language and Counterparts</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36.15pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: justify">&#26412;&#21327;&#35758;&#20197;&#20013;&#25991;&#21644;&#33521;&#25991;&#20070;&#23601;&#65292;&#19968;&#24335;&#20108;&#20221;&#65292;&#30002;&#20057;&#21452;&#26041;&#21508;&#25345;&#19968;&#20221;&#65292;&#20855;&#26377;&#21516;&#31561;&#25928;&#21147;&#65307;&#20013;&#33521;&#25991;&#29256;&#26412;&#22914;&#26377;&#20914;&#31361;&#65292;&#24212;&#20197;&#20013;&#25991;&#29256;&#20026;&#20934;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: justify">This Agreement is written in both Chinese
and English language in two copies, each Party having one copy with equal legal validity; in case there is any conflict between the Chinese
version and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: center"><I>&#26412;&#39029;&#20854;&#20313;&#37096;&#20998;&#21051;&#24847;&#30041;&#20026;&#31354;&#30333;</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: center"><I>The Remainder of this page is intentionally
left blank</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>


<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 11; Value: 2 -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in">&#26377;&#37492;&#20110;&#27492;&#65292;&#21452;&#26041;&#24050;&#20351;&#24471;&#32463;&#20854;&#25480;&#26435;&#30340;&#20195;&#34920;&#20110;&#25991;&#39318;&#25152;&#36848;&#26085;&#26399;&#31614;&#32626;&#20102;&#26412;&#19994;&#21153;&#21512;&#20316;&#21327;
&#35758;&#24182;&#21363;&#29983;&#25928;&#65292;&#20197;&#26157;&#20449;&#23432;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 0.5in">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have caused their
authorized representatives to execute this Business Cooperation Agreement as of the date first above written.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&#30002;&#26041;&#65306; &#20339;&#30410;&#31185;&#25216;&#65288;&#21688;&#23425;&#65289;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>Exhibit 10.6</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: center"><B>&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: center"><B>Equity Pledge Agreement</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24pt">&#26412;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&nbsp;(&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&rdquo;)&#30001;&#19979;&#21015;&#21508;&#26041;&#20110;2021&#24180;7&#26376;16&#26085;&#22312;&#20013;&#21326;&#20154;&#27665;&#20849;&#21644;&#22269;&#65288;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#20013;&#22269;&rdquo;&#65289;&#21688;&#23425;&#31614;&#35746;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24pt">This Equity Pledge Agreement
(this &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) has been executed by and among the following parties on July 16, 2021 in Xianning, the People&rsquo;s Republic
of China (&ldquo;China&rdquo; or the &ldquo;PRC&rdquo;):</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse">
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 0.75in; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&#30002;&#26041;&#65306;</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&#20339;&#30410;&#31185;&#25216;&#65288;&#21688;&#23425;&#65289;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;</B> &#65288;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;<B>&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;</B>&rdquo;&#65289;</FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#22320;&#22336;&#65306;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#28246;&#21271;&#30465;&#21688;&#23425;&#24066;&#40644;&#30024;&#26449;&#19968;&#32452;&#37329;&#33394;&#28023;&#28286;2&#24162;3&#23618;</FONT></TD>

  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">

    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Jiayi Technology (Xianning) Co., Ltd. (thereinafter &ldquo;Pledgee.&rdquo;)</B></FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">

    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">3/F, Building 2, Golden Bay, Group 1, Huangfan Village, Xianning City, Hubei Province</FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  </TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt"><B>Party B:
Xiaodong Cai</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt"><B>&#20057;&#26041;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&rdquo;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.05pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.05pt"><B>Parties B
is also referred as &ldquo;Pledger.&rdquo;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse">
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 0.75in; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&#19993;&#26041;&#65306;</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&#23433;&#24509;&#23433;&#30427;&#30707;&#21270;&#35774;&#22791;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;</B></FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#22320;&#22336;&#65306;</FONT></TD>
    <TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#23433;&#24509;&#30465;&#23459;&#22478;&#24066;&#37070;&#28330;&#21439;&#32463;&#27982;&#24320;&#21457;&#21306;</FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Party C:</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Anhui Ansheng Petrochemical Equipment Co., Ltd.</B></FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Address:&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Langxi Economic Development Zone, Xuancheng City, Anhui Province, China</FONT></TD>
    </TR>
  </TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in; text-align: justify; text-indent: -30pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in; text-align: justify; text-indent: -30pt">&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20013;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12289;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21644;&#19993;&#26041;&#20197;&#19979;&#21508;&#31216;&rdquo;&#19968;&#26041;&rdquo;&#65292;&#21512;&#31216;&rdquo;&#21508;&#26041;&rdquo;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in; text-align: justify; text-indent: -30pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 27.25pt">In this Agreement, each
of Pledgee, Pledger and Party C shall be referred to as a &ldquo;Party&rdquo; respectively, and they shall be collectively referred to
as the &ldquo;Parties&rdquo;.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 27.25pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&#37492;&#20110;&#65306;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Whereas:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1&#65294;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#23454;&#38469;&#25317;&#26377;&#19993;&#26041;86.58%&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#65292;&#20057;&#26041;&#23558;&#20854;&#25345;&#26377;&#30340;66%&#30340;&#32929;&#20221;&#36827;&#34892;&#36136;&#25276;&#12290;&#19993;&#26041;&#26159;&#19968;&#23478;&#22312;&#20013;&#22269;&#23459;&#22478;&#24066;&#25104;&#31435;&#30340;&#26377;&#38480;&#36131;&#20219;&#20844;&#21496;&#12290;&#19993;&#26041;&#22312;&#27492;&#30830;&#35748;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21644;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#19979;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#21644;&#20041;&#21153;&#24182;&#25552;&#20379;&#24517;&#35201;&#30340;&#21327;&#21161;&#20197;&#30331;&#35760;&#35813;&#36136;&#26435;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">Pledger holds 86.58% of the equity
interest in Party C in fact. Party B shall pledge 66% of the equity ownership. Party C is a limited liability company registered in Xuancheng
City, China. Party C acknowledges the respective rights and obligations of Pledger and Pledgee under this Agreement, and intends to provide
any necessary assistance in registering the Pledge;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2&#65294;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26159;&#19968;&#23478;&#22312;&#20013;&#22269;&#27880;&#20876;&#30340;&#22806;&#21830;&#29420;&#36164;&#20225;&#19994;&#12290;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#19982;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#12289;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#25152;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#19993;&#26041;&#31614;&#35746;&#20102;&#21672;&#35810;&#19982;&#26381;&#21153;&#21327;&#35758;&#31561;&#19968;&#31995;&#21015;&#26088;&#22312;&#24418;&#25104;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25511;&#21046;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#21327;&#35758;&#65288;&rdquo;<B>&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;</B>&rdquo;&#65289;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">Pledgee is a wholly foreign owned
enterprise registered in China. Pledgee, Pledger and Party C owned by Pledger have executed a Consultation and Service Agreement and other
control agreements (the &ldquo;<B>Control Agreements</B>&rdquo;);</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">3&#65294;&#20026;&#20102;&#20445;&#35777;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21450;&#19993;&#26041;&#23653;&#34892;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20041;&#21153;&#65292;&#25353;&#29031;&#32422;&#23450;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25903;&#20184;&#21672;&#35810;&#21644;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#31561;&#21040;&#26399;&#27454;&#39033;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#20197;&#20854;&#22312;&#19993;&#26041;&#20013;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#20840;&#37096;&#32929;&#26435;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#23601;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#20184;&#27454;&#20041;&#21153;&#20570;&#20986;&#36136;&#25276;&#25285;&#20445;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">To ensure that Pledger and Party C
fully perform their obligations under the Control Agreements, and pay the consulting and service fees thereunder to the Pledgee when the
sum becomes due, Pledger hereby pledges to the Pledgee all of the equity interest he holds in Party C as security for payment of the consulting
and service fees by Party C under the Control Agreements.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.25pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21pt; text-align: justify">&#20026;&#20102;&#23653;&#34892;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#30340;&#26465;&#27454;&#65292;&#21508;&#26041;&#21830;&#23450;&#25353;&#29031;&#20197;&#19979;&#26465;&#27454;&#31614;&#35746;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21pt; text-align: justify">To perform the provisions of the Control
Agreements, the Parties have mutually agreed to execute this Agreement upon the following terms.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>1. &#23450;&#20041;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>Definitions</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#38500;&#38750;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#21478;&#26377;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#19979;&#21015;&#35789;&#35821;&#21547;&#20041;&#20026;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Unless otherwise provided herein, the
terms below shall have the following meanings:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.1 &#36136;&#26435;&#65306;&#25351;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#26681;&#25454;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31532;2&#26465;&#32473;&#20104;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#30340;&#25285;&#20445;&#29289;&#26435;&#65292;&#21363;&#25351;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25152;&#20139;&#26377;&#30340;&#65292;&#20197;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#36136;&#25276;&#32473;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#25240;&#20215;&#25110;&#25293;&#21334;&#12289;&#21464;&#21334;&#35813;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#20215;&#27454;&#20248;&#20808;&#21463;&#20607;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledge: shall refer to the security interest
granted by Pledger to Pledgee pursuant to Section 2 of this Agreement, i.e., the right of Pledgee to be compensated on a preferential
basis with the conversion, auction or sales price of the Equity Interest.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.2 &#32929;&#26435;&#65306;&#25351;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#29616;&#22312;&#21644;&#23558;&#26469;&#21512;&#27861;&#25345;&#26377;&#30340;&#20854;&#22312;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#20840;&#37096;&#32929;&#26435;&#26435;&#30410;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Equity Interest: shall refer to all of
the equity interest lawfully now held and hereafter acquired by Pledger in Party C.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 2; Options: NewSection; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->2<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.3 &#36136;&#25276;&#26399;&#38480;&#65306;&#25351;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31532;3&#26465;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&#26399;&#38388;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Term of Pledge: shall refer to the term
set forth in Section 3 of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.4 &#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#65306;&#25351;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#12289;&#19993;&#26041;&#19982;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20110;2021&#24180;7&#26376;16&#26085;&#31614;&#35746;&#30340;&#21672;&#35810;&#19982;&#26381;&#21153;&#21327;&#35758;&#12289;&#19994;&#21153;&#21512;&#20316;&#21327;&#35758;&#31561;&#19968;&#31995;&#21015;&#25511;&#21046;&#24615;&#21327;&#35758;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Control Agreements: shall refer to Consultation
and Service Agreements, Business Cooperation Agreement and other relevant control agreements executed by and among Pledger, Party C and
Pledgee on July 16, 2021.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.5 &#36829;&#32422;&#20107;&#20214;&#65306;&#25351;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31532;7&#26465;&#25152;&#21015;&#20219;&#20309;&#24773;&#20917;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Event of Default: shall refer to any
of the circumstances set forth in Section 7 of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.6 &#36829;&#32422;&#36890;&#30693;&#65306;&#25351;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26681;&#25454;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#21457;&#20986;&#30340;&#23459;&#24067;&#36829;&#32422;&#20107;&#20214;&#30340;&#36890;&#30693;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Notice of Default: shall refer to the
notice issued by Pledgee in accordance with this Agreement declaring an Event of Default.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>2. &#36136;&#26435;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify"><B>The Pledge</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#20316;&#20026;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#12289;&#19993;&#26041;&#23436;&#20840;&#23653;&#34892;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#65292;&#20197;&#21450;&#25353;&#26102;&#21644;&#20840;&#39069;&#25903;&#20184;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#24212;&#24471;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#25110;&#20840;&#37096;&#30340;&#27454;&#39033;&#65292;&#21253;&#25324;&#20294;&#19981;&#38480;&#20110;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#20013;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&#21672;&#35810;&#21644;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#30340;&#25285;&#20445;&#65288;&#26080;&#35770;&#35813;&#31561;&#36153;&#29992;&#30340;&#21040;&#26399;&#24212;&#20184;&#26159;&#30001;&#20110;&#21040;&#26399;&#26085;&#30340;&#21040;&#26469;&#12289;&#25552;&#21069;&#25910;&#27454;&#30340;&#35201;&#27714;&#25110;&#20854;&#23427;&#21407;&#22240;&#65289;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#29305;&#27492;&#23558;&#20854;&#29616;&#26377;&#25110;&#23558;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#20840;&#37096;&#32929;&#26435;&#26435;&#30410;&#36136;&#25276;&#32473;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">As collateral security for the performance
of the Control Agreements and the timely and complete payment when due (whether at stated maturity, by acceleration or otherwise) of any
or all of the payments due by Party C and/or Pledger, including without limitation the consulting and services fees payable to the Pledgee
under the Control Agreements, Pledger hereby pledges to Pledgee a first security interest in all of Pledger&rsquo;s right, title and interest,
whether now owned or hereafter acquired by Pledger, in the Equity Interest of Party C.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 3; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->3<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>3. &#36136;&#25276;&#26399;&#38480;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 5.9pt"><B>Term of Pledge</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 5.9pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">3.1 &#26412;&#21327;&#35758;&#31614;&#32626;&#21518;&#65292;&#26412;&#21327;&#35758;&#21508;&#26041;&#24212;&#23613;&#24555;&#23436;&#25104;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#24037;&#21830;&#30331;&#35760;&#12290;&#36136;&#26435;&#26377;&#25928;&#26399;&#25345;&#32493;&#21040;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#19981;&#20877;&#25285;&#20219;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#32929;&#19996;&#25110;&#19993;&#26041;&#23653;&#34892;&#25152;&#26377;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#20041;&#21153;&#20026;&#27490;&#12290;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#24403;&#23558;&#36136;&#25276;&#22312;&#20844;&#21496;&#32929;&#19996;&#21517;&#20876;&#19978;&#36733;&#26126;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Upon signing this Agreement, the Parties
should complete the pledge of the Equity Interest contemplated registered with relevant administration for industry and commerce (the
&ldquo;AIC&rdquo;) as soon as possible. The Pledge shall be continuously valid until the Pledger is no longer a shareholder of Party C
or the satisfaction of all its obligations by the Party C under the Control Agreements. The Pledgers shall be responsible for recording
of this Agreement in the Company&rsquo;s Register of Shareholders.&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">3.2 &#36136;&#25276;&#26399;&#38480;&#20869;&#65292;&#22914;&#19993;&#26041;&#26410;&#25353;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#20132;&#20184;&#21672;&#35810;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#31561;&#36153;&#29992;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26377;&#26435;&#20294;&#26080;&#20041;&#21153;&#25353;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#22788;&#20998;&#36136;&#26435;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">During the Term of Pledge, in the event
Party C fails to pay the exclusive consulting or service fees in accordance with the Control Agreements, Pledgee shall have the right,
but not the obligation, to dispose of the Pledge in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.7pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>4. &#36136;&#26435;&#20973;&#35777;&#30340;&#20445;&#31649;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Custody of Records for
Equity Interest subject to Pledge</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">4.1 &#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&#36136;&#25276;&#26399;&#38480;&#20869;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#23558;&#20854;&#22312;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#20986;&#36164;&#35777;&#26126;&#20070;&#21450;&#35760;&#36733;&#36136;&#26435;&#30340;&#32929;&#19996;&#21517;&#20876;&#20132;&#20184;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20445;&#31649;&#12290;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31614;&#35746;&#20043;&#26085;&#36215;&#19968;&#21608;&#20869;&#23558;&#19978;&#36848;&#32929;&#26435;&#20986;&#36164;&#35777;&#26126;&#20070;&#21450;&#32929;&#19996;&#21517;&#20876;&#20132;&#20184;&#32473;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12290;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#23558;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&#20840;&#37096;&#36136;&#25276;&#26399;&#38388;&#19968;&#30452;&#20445;&#31649;&#36825;&#20123;&#39033;&#30446;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">During the Term of Pledge set forth in
this Agreement, Pledger shall deliver to Pledgee&rsquo;s custody the capital contribution certificate for the Equity Interest and the
shareholders&rsquo; register containing the Pledge within one week from the execution of this Agreement. Pledgee shall have custody of
such items during the entire Term of Pledge set forth in this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">4.2 &#22312;&#36136;&#25276;&#26399;&#38480;&#20869;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26377;&#26435;&#25910;&#21462;&#32929;&#26435;&#25152;&#20135;&#29983;&#30340;&#32418;&#21033;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledgee shall have the right to collect
dividends generated by the Equity Interest during the Term of Pledge.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.7pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>5. &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#30340;&#22768;&#26126;&#21644;&#20445;&#35777;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Representations and Warranties
of Pledger</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">5.1 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#26159;&#32929;&#26435;&#30331;&#35760;&#25152;&#26377;&#20154;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledger is the owner of the Equity Interest
in record of register of shareholder.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">5.2 &#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26377;&#26435;&#20197;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&#26041;&#24335;&#22788;&#20998;&#24182;&#36716;&#35753;&#32929;&#26435;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledgee shall have the right to dispose
of and transfer the Equity Interest in accordance with the provisions set forth in this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 4; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->4<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">5.3 &#38500;&#26412;&#36136;&#26435;&#20043;&#22806;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#26410;&#22312;&#32929;&#26435;&#19978;&#35774;&#32622;&#20219;&#20309;&#20854;&#20182;&#36136;&#25276;&#26435;&#21033;&#25110;&#20854;&#20182;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Except for the Pledge, Pledger has not
placed any security interest or other encumbrance on the Equity Interest.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>6. &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#30340;&#25215;&#35834;&#21644;&#30830;&#35748;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Covenants and Further
Agreements of Pledger</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.1 &#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#23384;&#32493;&#26399;&#38388;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25215;&#35834;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#23558;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledger hereby covenants to the Pledgee,
that during the term of this Agreement, Pledger shall:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.7pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.1.1 &#38500;&#23653;&#34892;&#30001;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#19982;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12289;&#19993;&#26041;&#20110;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31614;&#32626;&#26085;&#31614;&#35746;&#30340;&#12298;&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#20998;&#21512;&#21516;&#12299;&#65288;&rdquo;&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#20998;&#21512;&#21516;&rdquo;&#65289;&#22806;&#65292;&#26410;&#32463;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#24471;&#36716;&#35753;&#32929;&#26435;&#65292;&#19981;&#24471;&#22312;&#32929;&#26435;&#19978;&#35774;&#31435;&#25110;&#20801;&#35768;&#23384;&#22312;&#20219;&#20309;&#25285;&#20445;&#25110;&#20854;&#20182;&#20538;&#21153;&#36127;&#25285;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">not transfer the Equity Interest, place
or permit the existence of any security interest or other encumbrance on the Equity Interest, without the prior written consent of Pledgee,
except for the performance of the Equity Option Agreement (the &ldquo;Equity Option Agreement&rdquo;) executed by Pledger, the Pledgee
and Party C on the execution date of this Agreement;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.1.2 &#36981;&#23432;&#24182;&#25191;&#34892;&#25152;&#26377;&#26377;&#20851;&#26435;&#21033;&#36136;&#25276;&#30340;&#27861;&#24459;&#12289;&#27861;&#35268;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#22312;&#25910;&#21040;&#26377;&#20851;&#20027;&#31649;&#26426;&#20851;&#23601;&#36136;&#26435;&#21457;&#20986;&#25110;&#21046;&#23450;&#30340;&#36890;&#30693;&#12289;&#25351;&#20196;&#25110;&#24314;&#35758;&#26102;&#65292;&#20110;&#20116;&#20010;&#24037;&#20316;&#26085;&#20869;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20986;&#31034;&#19978;&#36848;&#36890;&#30693;&#12289;&#25351;&#20196;&#25110;&#24314;&#35758;&#65292;&#21516;&#26102;&#36981;&#23432;&#19978;&#36848;&#36890;&#30693;&#12289;&#25351;&#20196;&#25110;&#24314;&#35758;&#65292;&#25110;&#25353;&#29031;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#30340;&#21512;&#29702;&#35201;&#27714;&#25110;&#32463;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21516;&#24847;&#23601;&#19978;&#36848;&#20107;&#23452;&#25552;&#20986;&#21453;&#23545;&#24847;&#35265;&#21644;&#38472;&#36848;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">comply with the provisions of all laws
and regulations applicable to the pledge of rights, and within 5 working days of receipt of any notice, order or recommendation issued
or prepared by relevant competent authorities regarding the Pledge, shall present the aforementioned notice, order or recommendation to
Pledgee, and shall comply with the aforementioned notice, order or recommendation or submit objections and representations with respect
to the aforementioned matters upon Pledgee&rsquo;s reasonable request or upon consent of Pledgee;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.1.3 &#23558;&#20219;&#20309;&#21487;&#33021;&#23548;&#33268;&#23545;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#32929;&#26435;&#25110;&#20854;&#20219;&#20309;&#37096;&#20998;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#20135;&#29983;&#24433;&#21709;&#30340;&#20107;&#20214;&#25110;&#25910;&#21040;&#30340;&#36890;&#30693;&#65292;&#20197;&#21450;&#21487;&#33021;&#25913;&#21464;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20013;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20445;&#35777;&#12289;&#20041;&#21153;&#25110;&#23545;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#23653;&#34892;&#20854;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20013;&#20041;&#21153;&#21487;&#33021;&#20135;&#29983;&#24433;&#21709;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20107;&#20214;&#25110;&#25910;&#21040;&#30340;&#36890;&#30693;&#21450;&#26102;&#36890;&#30693;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">promptly notify Pledgee of any event
or notice received by Pledger that may have an impact on Pledgee&rsquo;s rights to the Equity Interest or any portion thereof, as well
as any event or notice received by Pledger that may have an impact on any guarantees and other obligations of Pledger arising out of this
Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 5; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->5<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.2 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25353;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#26465;&#27454;&#21462;&#24471;&#30340;&#23545;&#36136;&#26435;&#20139;&#26377;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#65292;&#19981;&#24212;&#21463;&#21040;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#25110;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#30340;&#32487;&#25215;&#20154;&#25110;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#20043;&#22996;&#25176;&#20154;&#25110;&#20219;&#20309;&#20854;&#20182;&#20154;&#36890;&#36807;&#27861;&#24459;&#31243;&#24207;&#30340;&#20013;&#26029;&#25110;&#22952;&#23475;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledger agrees that the rights acquired
by Pledgee in accordance with this Agreement with respect to the Pledge shall not be interrupted or harmed by Pledger or any heirs or
representatives of Pledger or any other persons through any legal proceedings.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.3 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20445;&#35777;&#65292;&#20026;&#20445;&#25252;&#25110;&#23436;&#21892;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#23545;&#20607;&#20184;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#21672;&#35810;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#31561;&#36153;&#29992;&#30340;&#25285;&#20445;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#23558;&#35802;&#23454;&#31614;&#32626;&#12289;&#24182;&#20419;&#20351;&#20854;&#20182;&#19982;&#36136;&#26435;&#26377;&#21033;&#23475;&#20851;&#31995;&#30340;&#24403;&#20107;&#20154;&#31614;&#32626;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25152;&#35201;&#27714;&#30340;&#25152;&#26377;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#35777;&#20070;&#12289;&#22865;&#32422;&#21644;/&#25110;&#23653;&#34892;&#24182;&#20419;&#20351;&#20854;&#20182;&#26377;&#21033;&#23475;&#20851;&#31995;&#30340;&#24403;&#20107;&#20154;&#23653;&#34892;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25152;&#35201;&#27714;&#30340;&#34892;&#20026;&#65292;&#24182;&#20026;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#36171;&#20104;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20043;&#26435;&#21033;&#12289;&#25480;&#26435;&#30340;&#34892;&#20351;&#25552;&#20379;&#20415;&#21033;&#65292;&#19982;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25110;&#20854;&#25351;&#23450;&#30340;&#20154;(&#33258;&#28982;&#20154;/&#27861;&#20154;)&#31614;&#32626;&#25152;&#26377;&#30340;&#26377;&#20851;&#32929;&#26435;&#25152;&#26377;&#26435;&#30340;&#25991;&#20214;&#65292;&#24182;&#22312;&#21512;&#29702;&#26399;&#38388;&#20869;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#25552;&#20379;&#20854;&#35748;&#20026;&#38656;&#35201;&#30340;&#25152;&#26377;&#30340;&#26377;&#20851;&#36136;&#26435;&#30340;&#36890;&#30693;&#12289;&#21629;&#20196;&#21450;&#20915;&#23450;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">To protect or perfect the security interest
granted by this Agreement for payment of the consulting and service fees under the Control Agreements, Pledger hereby undertakes to execute
in good faith and to cause other parties who have an interest in the Pledge to execute all certificates, agreements, deeds and/or covenants
required by Pledgee. Pledger also undertakes to perform and to cause other parties who have an interest in the Pledge to perform actions
required by Pledgee, to facilitate the exercise by Pledgee of its rights and authority granted thereto by this Agreement, and to enter
into all relevant documents regarding ownership of Equity Interest with Pledgee or designee(s) of Pledgee (natural persons/legal persons).
Pledger undertakes to provide Pledgee within a reasonable time with all notices, orders and decisions regarding the Pledge that are required
by Pledgee.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.4 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20445;&#35777;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#23558;&#36981;&#23432;&#12289;&#23653;&#34892;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#25152;&#26377;&#30340;&#20445;&#35777;&#12289;&#25215;&#35834;&#12289;&#21327;&#35758;&#12289;&#38472;&#36848;&#21450;&#26465;&#20214;&#12290;&#22914;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#19981;&#23653;&#34892;&#25110;&#19981;&#23436;&#20840;&#23653;&#34892;&#20854;&#20445;&#35777;&#12289;&#25215;&#35834;&#12289;&#21327;&#35758;&#12289;&#38472;&#36848;&#21450;&#26465;&#20214;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#36180;&#20607;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#30001;&#27492;&#36973;&#21463;&#30340;&#19968;&#20999;&#25439;&#22833;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledger hereby undertakes to comply with
and perform all guarantees, promises, agreements, representations and conditions under this Agreement. In the event of failure or partial
performance of its guarantees, promises, agreements, representations and conditions, Pledger shall indemnify Pledgee for all losses resulting
therefrom.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.5 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#22312;&#26412;&#21327;&#35758;&#31614;&#35746;&#21518;&#23613;&#21487;&#33021;&#24555;&#22320;&#21521;&#24037;&#21830;&#34892;&#25919;&#31649;&#29702;&#23616;&#21150;&#29702;&#36136;&#25276;&#30331;&#35760;&#25163;&#32493;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The Pledgers shall process the registration
procedures with the Administration for Industry and Commerce concerning the Pledge as soon as practical after the execution of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">6.6 &#26410;&#32463;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#36890;&#30693;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#24182;&#33719;&#24471;&#20854;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#19981;&#24471;&#23558;&#32929;&#26435;&#36716;&#35753;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#30340;&#25152;&#26377;&#25311;&#36716;&#35753;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#34892;&#20026;&#26080;&#25928;&#12290;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#36716;&#35753;&#32929;&#26435;&#25152;&#24471;&#20215;&#27454;&#24212;&#39318;&#20808;&#29992;&#20110;&#25552;&#21069;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#28165;&#20607;&#25285;&#20445;&#20538;&#21153;&#25110;&#21521;&#19982;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#32422;&#23450;&#30340;&#31532;&#19977;&#20154;&#25552;&#23384;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Without notifying Pledgee in advance
and obtaining Pledgee&rsquo;s prior written consent, Pledger shall not transfer the Equity Interest and any action for the proposed transfer
of the Equity Interest of Pledger shall be invalid. Any payment received by Pledger for transfer of the Equity Interest shall be firstly
used to repay the secured obligations to Pledgee or be placed in escrow with a third party as agreed with Pledgee.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 6; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->6<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>7. &#36829;&#32422;&#20107;&#20214;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify"><B>Event of Breach</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1 &#19979;&#21015;&#20107;&#39033;&#22343;&#34987;&#35270;&#20026;&#36829;&#32422;&#20107;&#20214;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The following circumstances shall be
deemed Event of Default:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 28.35pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 22.05pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1.1 &#19993;&#26041;&#26410;&#33021;&#25353;&#26399;&#12289;&#23436;&#25972;&#23653;&#34892;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#20219;&#20309;&#36131;&#20219;&#65292;&#21253;&#25324;&#20294;&#19981;&#38480;&#20110;&#19993;&#26041;&#26410;&#33021;&#25353;&#26399;&#36275;&#39069;&#25903;&#20184;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#24212;&#20184;&#30340;&#21672;&#35810;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#31561;&#36153;&#29992;&#25110;&#26377;&#36829;&#21453;&#35813;&#21327;&#35758;&#20854;&#20182;&#20041;&#21153;&#30340;&#34892;&#20026;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Party C fails to fully and timely fulfill
any liabilities under the Control Agreements, including without limitation failure to pay in full any of the consulting and service fees
payable under the Control Agreements or breaches any other obligations of Party C thereunder;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1.2 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#25110;&#19993;&#26041;&#23454;&#36136;&#36829;&#21453;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#26465;&#27454;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledger or Party C has committed a material
breach of any provisions of this Agreement;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1.3 &#38500;&#23653;&#34892;&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#20998;&#21512;&#21516;&#22806;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#33293;&#24323;&#20986;&#36136;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#25110;&#26410;&#33719;&#24471;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#32780;&#25797;&#33258;&#36716;&#35753;&#25110;&#24847;&#22270;&#36716;&#35753;&#20986;&#36136;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Except for the performance of the Equity
Option Agreement, Pledger transfers or purports to transfer or abandons the Equity Interest pledged or assigns the Equity Interest pledged
without the written consent of Pledgee; and</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1.4 &#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#32487;&#25215;&#20154;&#25110;&#20195;&#31649;&#20154;&#21482;&#33021;&#23653;&#34892;&#37096;&#20998;&#25110;&#25298;&#32477;&#23653;&#34892;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#25903;&#20184;&#36131;&#20219;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The successor or custodian of Party C
is capable of only partially performing or refusing to perform the payment obligations under the Control Agreements.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1.5 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#22240;&#20854;&#25152;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#36130;&#20135;&#20986;&#29616;&#19981;&#21033;&#21464;&#21270;&#65292;&#33268;&#20351;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#35748;&#20026;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#23653;&#34892;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20041;&#21153;&#30340;&#33021;&#21147;&#24050;&#21463;&#21040;&#24433;&#21709;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The occurrence of any adverse change
to the assets or property of the Pledger, which in Pledgee&rsquo;s determination, may impact the ability of the Pledger to perform its
obligations hereunder.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.1.6 &#25353;&#26377;&#20851;&#27861;&#24459;&#35268;&#23450;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#19981;&#33021;&#25110;&#21487;&#33021;&#19981;&#33021;&#34892;&#20351;&#22788;&#20998;&#36136;&#26435;&#30340;&#20854;&#20182;&#24773;&#20917;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The occurrence of any other circumstances
under which the Pledgee is not or may not able to exercise its rights hereunder in accordance with the applicable law.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 7; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->7<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.2 &#22914;&#30693;&#36947;&#25110;&#21457;&#29616;&#26412;&#31532;7.1&#26465;&#25152;&#36848;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20107;&#39033;&#25110;&#21487;&#33021;&#23548;&#33268;&#19978;&#36848;&#20107;&#39033;&#30340;&#20107;&#20214;&#24050;&#32463;&#21457;&#29983;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#31435;&#21363;&#20197;&#20070;&#38754;&#24418;&#24335;&#36890;&#30693;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Upon notice or discovery of the occurrence
of any circumstances or event that may lead to the aforementioned circumstances described in Section 7.1, Pledger shall immediately notify
Pledgee in writing accordingly.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">7.3 &#38500;&#38750;&#31532;7.1&#37096;&#20998;&#19979;&#30340;&#36829;&#32422;&#20107;&#20214;&#22312;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21521;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21457;&#20986;&#35201;&#27714;&#20854;&#20462;&#27491;&#27492;&#36829;&#32422;&#34892;&#20026;&#36890;&#30693;&#21518;&#30340;&#20108;&#21313;&#65288;20&#65289;&#22825;&#20043;&#20869;&#24050;&#32463;&#25353;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#35201;&#27714;&#33719;&#24471;&#25937;&#27982;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#22312;&#20854;&#21518;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#26102;&#38388;&#65292;&#21487;&#21521;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21457;&#20986;&#20070;&#38754;&#36829;&#32422;&#36890;&#30693;&#65292;&#35201;&#27714;&#31435;&#21363;&#20381;&#25454;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31532;8&#26465;&#34892;&#20351;&#36136;&#26435;&#26435;&#21033;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Unless an Event of Default set forth
in this Section 7.1 has been successfully resolved to Pledgee&rsquo;s satisfaction within twenty (20) days after the Pledgee delivers
a notice to the Pledger requesting ratification of such Event of Default, Pledgee may issue a Notice of Default to Pledger in writing
at any time thereafter, demanding to immediately dispose of the Pledge in accordance with the provisions of Section 8 of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">8. <B>&#36136;&#26435;&#30340;&#34892;&#20351;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify"><B>Exercise of Pledge</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">8.1 &#22312;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#25152;&#36848;&#30340;&#21672;&#35810;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#31561;&#36153;&#29992;&#26410;&#20840;&#37096;&#20607;&#20184;&#21069;&#65292;&#26410;&#32463;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#19981;&#24471;&#36716;&#35753;&#20854;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#19993;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Prior to the full payment of the consulting
and service fees described in the Control Agreements, without the Pledgee&rsquo;s written consent, Pledger shall not assign the Equity
Interest in Party C.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">8.2 &#22312;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#34892;&#20351;&#20854;&#36136;&#25276;&#26435;&#21033;&#26102;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21487;&#20197;&#21521;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21457;&#20986;&#20070;&#38754;&#36890;&#30693;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledgee may issue a written notice to
Pledger when exercising the Pledge.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">8.3 &#21463;&#38480;&#20110;&#31532;7.3&#26465;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21487;&#22312;&#25353;&#31532;7.3&#26465;&#21457;&#20986;&#36829;&#32422;&#36890;&#30693;&#20043;&#21518;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#26102;&#38388;&#37324;&#23545;&#36136;&#26435;&#34892;&#20351;&#22788;&#20998;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#12290;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20915;&#23450;&#34892;&#20351;&#22788;&#20998;&#36136;&#26435;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#26102;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21363;&#19981;&#20877;&#25317;&#26377;&#20219;&#20309;&#19982;&#32929;&#26435;&#26377;&#20851;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#21644;&#21033;&#30410;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Subject to the provisions of Section
7.3, Pledgee may exercise the right to enforce the Pledge at any time after the issuance of the Notice of Default in accordance with Section
7.3. Once Pledgee elects to enforce the Pledge, Pledger shall cease to be entitled to any rights or interests associated with the Equity
Interest.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 8; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->8<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">8.4 &#22312;&#36829;&#32422;&#26102;&#65292;&#26681;&#25454;&#20013;&#22269;&#26377;&#20851;&#27861;&#24459;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26377;&#26435;&#25353;&#29031;&#27861;&#23450;&#31243;&#24207;&#22788;&#32622;&#36136;&#25276;&#32929;&#26435;&#12290;&#22312;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#20801;&#35768;&#30340;&#33539;&#22260;&#20869;&#65292;&#23545;&#20110;&#22788;&#32622;&#30340;&#25152;&#24471;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#26080;&#38656;&#32473;&#20184;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#65307;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#29305;&#27492;&#25918;&#24323;&#20854;&#21487;&#33021;&#26377;&#30340;&#33021;&#21521;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#35201;&#27714;&#20219;&#20309;&#36136;&#25276;&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#32622;&#25152;&#24471;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">In the event of default, Pledgee is entitled
to dispose of the Equity Interest in accordance with applicable PRC laws. Only to the extent permitted under applicable PRC laws, Pledgee
has no obligation to account to Pledger for proceeds of disposition of the Equity Interest, and Pledger hereby waives any rights it may
have to demand any such accounting from Pledgee.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">8.5 &#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20381;&#29031;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#22788;&#20998;&#36136;&#26435;&#26102;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21644;&#19993;&#26041;&#24212;&#20104;&#20197;&#24517;&#35201;&#30340;&#21327;&#21161;&#65292;&#20197;&#20351;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#23454;&#29616;&#20854;&#36136;&#26435;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">When Pledgee disposes of the Pledge in
accordance with this Agreement, Pledger and Party C shall provide necessary assistance to enable Pledgee to enforce the Pledge in accordance
with this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>9. &#36716;&#35753;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Assignment</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">9.1 &#38500;&#38750;&#32463;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20107;&#20808;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#26080;&#26435;&#36192;&#20104;&#25110;&#36716;&#35753;&#20854;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#20041;&#21153;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Without Pledgee&rsquo;s prior written
consent, Pledger shall not have the right to assign or delegate its rights and obligations under this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">9.2 &#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#23545;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21450;&#20854;&#32487;&#20219;&#20154;&#21644;&#32463;&#35768;&#21487;&#30340;&#21463;&#35753;&#20154;&#22343;&#26377;&#32422;&#26463;&#21147;&#65292;&#24182;&#19988;&#23545;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21450;&#27599;&#19968;&#32487;&#20219;&#20154;&#21644;&#21463;&#35753;&#20154;&#26377;&#25928;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">This Agreement shall be binding on Pledger
and its successors and permitted assigns, and shall be valid with respect to Pledgee and each of its successors and assigns.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">9.3 &#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21487;&#20197;&#22312;&#20219;&#20309;&#26102;&#20505;&#23558;&#20854;&#22312;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#25152;&#26377;&#25110;&#20219;&#20309;&#26435;&#21033;&#21644;&#20041;&#21153;&#36716;&#35753;&#32473;&#20854;&#25351;&#23450;&#30340;&#20154;&#65288;&#33258;&#28982;&#20154;/&#27861;&#20154;&#65289;&#65292;&#22312;&#36825;&#31181;&#24773;&#20917;&#19979;&#65292;&#21463;&#35753;&#20154;&#24212;&#20139;&#26377;&#21644;&#25215;&#25285;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#20139;&#26377;&#21644;&#25215;&#25285;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#21644;&#20041;&#21153;&#65292;&#22914;&#21516;&#20854;&#20316;&#20026;&#21407;&#21512;&#21516;&#26041;&#24212;&#20139;&#26377;&#21644;&#25215;&#25285;&#30340;&#19968;&#26679;&#12290;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#36716;&#35753;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#21644;&#20041;&#21153;&#26102;&#65292;&#24212;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#35201;&#27714;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#23601;&#27492;&#36716;&#35753;&#31614;&#32626;&#26377;&#20851;&#21327;&#35758;&#21644;/&#25110;&#25991;&#20214;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">At any time, Pledgee may assign any and
all of its rights and obligations under the Control Agreements to its designee(s) (natural/legal persons), in which case the assigns shall
have the rights and obligations of Pledgee under this Agreement, as if it were the original party to this Agreement. When the Pledgee
assigns the rights and obligations under the Control Agreements, upon Pledgee&rsquo;s request, Pledger shall execute relevant agreements
or other documents relating to such assignment.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">9.4 &#22240;&#36716;&#35753;&#25152;&#23548;&#33268;&#30340;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#21464;&#26356;&#21518;&#65292;&#24212;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#35201;&#27714;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#19982;&#26032;&#30340;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#31614;&#35746;&#19968;&#20221;&#20869;&#23481;&#19982;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#19968;&#33268;&#30340;&#26032;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&#65292;&#24182;&#22312;&#30456;&#24212;&#30340;&#24037;&#21830;&#34892;&#25919;&#31649;&#29702;&#26426;&#20851;&#36827;&#34892;&#30331;&#35760;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">In the event of a change in Pledgee due
to an assignment, Pledger shall, at the request of Pledgee, execute a new pledge agreement with the new pledgee on the same terms and
conditions as this Agreement, and register the same with the relevant AIC.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 9; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->9<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">9.5 &#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#24212;&#20005;&#26684;&#36981;&#23432;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#21644;&#21508;&#26041;&#21333;&#29420;&#25110;&#20849;&#21516;&#31614;&#32626;&#30340;&#20854;&#20182;&#26377;&#20851;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#21253;&#25324;&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#20998;&#21512;&#21516;&#21644;&#23545;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#30340;&#25480;&#26435;&#22996;&#25176;&#20070;&#65292;&#23653;&#34892;&#21508;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20041;&#21153;&#65292;&#24182;&#19981;&#24471;&#36827;&#34892;&#20219;&#20309;&#36275;&#20197;&#24433;&#21709;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#26377;&#25928;&#24615;&#21644;&#21487;&#24378;&#21046;&#25191;&#34892;&#24615;&#30340;&#20316;&#20026;/&#19981;&#20316;&#20026;&#34892;&#20026;&#12290;&#38500;&#38750;&#26681;&#25454;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#30340;&#20070;&#38754;&#25351;&#31034;&#65292;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#19981;&#24471;&#34892;&#20351;&#20854;&#23545;&#36136;&#25276;&#32929;&#26435;&#36824;&#30041;&#23384;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Pledger shall strictly abide by the provisions
of this Agreement and other contracts jointly or separately executed by the Parties hereto or any of them, including the Equity Option
Agreement and the Power of Attorney granted to Pledgee, perform the obligations hereunder and thereunder, and refrain from any action/omission
that may affect the effectiveness and enforceability thereof. Any remaining rights of Pledger with respect to the Equity Interest pledged
hereunder shall not be exercised by Pledger except in accordance with the written instructions of Pledgee.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>10. &#32456;&#27490;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Termination</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#22312;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#21672;&#35810;&#26381;&#21153;&#36153;&#31561;&#36153;&#29992;&#20607;&#36824;&#23436;&#27605;&#65292;&#24182;&#19988;&#19993;&#26041;&#19981;&#20877;&#25215;&#25285;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20041;&#21153;&#20043;&#21518;&#65292;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#32456;&#27490;&#65292;&#24182;&#19988;&#22312;&#23613;&#26089;&#21512;&#29702;&#21487;&#34892;&#30340;&#26102;&#38388;&#20869;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#24212;&#35299;&#38500;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#19979;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Upon the full payment of the consulting
and service fees under the Control Agreements and upon termination of Party C&rsquo;s obligations under the Control Agreements, this Agreement
shall be terminated, and Pledgee shall then terminate the equity pledge under this Agreement as soon as reasonably practicable.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>11. &#25163;&#32493;&#36153;&#21450;&#20854;&#20182;&#36153;&#29992;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 2.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.1pt"><B>Handling Fees
and Other Expenses</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 2.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#19968;&#20999;&#19982;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#26377;&#20851;&#30340;&#36153;&#29992;&#21450;&#23454;&#38469;&#24320;&#25903;&#65292;&#20854;&#20013;&#21253;&#25324;&#20294;&#19981;&#38480;&#20110;&#27861;&#24459;&#36153;&#29992;&#12289;&#24037;&#26412;&#36153;&#12289;&#21360;&#33457;&#31246;&#20197;&#21450;&#20219;&#20309;&#20854;&#20182;&#31246;&#25910;&#12289;&#36153;&#29992;&#31561;&#20840;&#37096;&#30001;&#19993;&#26041;&#25215;&#25285;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">All fees and out of pocket expenses relating
to this Agreement, including but not limited to legal costs, costs of production, stamp tax and any other taxes and fees, shall be borne
