by Party C.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 10; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->10<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>12. &#20445;&#23494;&#36131;&#20219;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Confidentiality</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#21508;&#26041;&#25215;&#35748;&#21450;&#30830;&#23450;&#26377;&#20851;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#12289;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20869;&#23481;&#65292;&#20197;&#21450;&#24444;&#27492;&#23601;&#20934;&#22791;&#25110;&#23653;&#34892;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#32780;&#20132;&#25442;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#21475;&#22836;&#25110;&#20070;&#38754;&#36164;&#26009;&#22343;&#34987;&#35270;&#20026;&#20445;&#23494;&#20449;&#24687;&#12290;&#21508;&#26041;&#24212;&#24403;&#23545;&#25152;&#26377;&#35813;&#31561;&#20445;&#23494;&#20449;&#24687;&#20104;&#20197;&#20445;&#23494;&#65292;&#32780;&#22312;&#26410;&#24471;&#21040;&#21478;&#19968;&#26041;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#21069;&#65292;&#19981;&#24471;&#21521;&#20219;&#20309;&#31532;&#19977;&#32773;&#25259;&#38706;&#20219;&#20309;&#20445;&#23494;&#20449;&#24687;&#65292;&#24799;&#19979;&#21015;&#20449;&#24687;&#38500;&#22806;&#65306;(a)&#20844;&#20247;&#20154;&#22763;&#30693;&#24713;&#25110;&#23558;&#20250;&#30693;&#24713;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20449;&#24687;&#65288;&#24799;&#24182;&#38750;&#30001;&#25509;&#21463;&#20445;&#23494;&#20449;&#24687;&#20043;&#19968;&#26041;&#25797;&#33258;&#21521;&#20844;&#20247;&#25259;&#38706;&#65289;&#65307;(b)&#26681;&#25454;&#36866;&#29992;&#27861;&#24459;&#27861;&#35268;&#12289;&#32929;&#31080;&#20132;&#26131;&#35268;&#21017;&#12289;&#25110;&#25919;&#24220;&#37096;&#38376;&#25110;&#27861;&#38498;&#30340;&#21629;&#20196;&#32780;&#25152;&#38656;&#25259;&#38706;&#20043;&#20219;&#20309;&#20449;&#24687;&#65307;&#25110;(c)&#30001;&#20219;&#20309;&#19968;&#26041;&#23601;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#25152;&#36848;&#20132;&#26131;&#32780;&#38656;&#21521;&#20854;&#32929;&#19996;&#12289;&#25237;&#36164;&#32773;&#12289;&#27861;&#24459;&#25110;&#36130;&#21153;&#39038;&#38382;&#25259;&#38706;&#20043;&#20449;&#24687;&#65292;&#32780;&#35813;&#32929;&#19996;&#12289;&#27861;&#24459;&#25110;&#36130;&#21153;&#39038;&#38382;&#20134;&#38656;&#36981;&#23432;&#19982;&#26412;&#26465;&#27454;&#30456;&#31867;&#20284;&#20043;&#20445;&#23494;&#36131;&#20219;&#12290;&#22914;&#20219;&#20309;&#19968;&#26041;&#24037;&#20316;&#20154;&#21592;&#25110;&#32856;&#35831;&#26426;&#26500;&#30340;&#27844;&#23494;&#22343;&#35270;&#20026;&#35813;&#26041;&#30340;&#27844;&#23494;&#65292;&#38656;&#20381;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#25215;&#25285;&#36829;&#32422;&#36131;&#20219;&#12290;&#26080;&#35770;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20197;&#20219;&#20309;&#29702;&#30001;&#32456;&#27490;&#65292;&#26412;&#26465;&#27454;&#20173;&#28982;&#29983;&#25928;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The Parties acknowledge that the existence
and the terms of this Agreement and any oral or written information exchanged between the Parties in connection with the preparation and
performance this Agreement are regarded as confidential information. Each Party shall maintain confidentiality of all such confidential
information, and without obtaining the written consent of the other Party, it shall not disclose any relevant confidential information
to any third parties, except for the information that: (a) is or will be in the public domain (other than through the receiving Party&rsquo;s
unauthorized disclosure); (b) is under the obligation to be disclosed pursuant to the applicable laws or regulations, rules of any stock
exchange, or orders of the court or other government authorities; or (c) is required to be disclosed by any Party to its shareholders,
investors, legal counsels or financial advisors regarding the transaction contemplated hereunder, provided that such shareholders, investors,
legal counsels or financial advisors shall be bound by the confidentiality obligations similar to those set forth in this Section. Disclosure
of any confidential information by the staff members or agencies hired by any Party shall be deemed disclosure of such confidential information
by such Party, which Party shall be held liable for breach of this Agreement. This Section shall survive the termination of this Agreement
for any reason.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>13. &#36866;&#29992;&#27861;&#24459;&#21644;&#20105;&#35758;&#30340;&#35299;&#20915;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Governing Law and Resolution
of Disputes</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">13.1 &#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#35746;&#31435;&#12289;&#25928;&#21147;&#12289;&#35299;&#37322;&#12289;&#23653;&#34892;&#12289;&#20462;&#25913;&#21644;&#32456;&#27490;&#20197;&#21450;&#20105;&#35758;&#30340;&#35299;&#20915;&#22343;&#36866;&#29992;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The execution, effectiveness, construction,
performance, amendment and termination of this Agreement and the resolution of disputes hereunder shall be governed by the laws of China.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">13.2 &#22240;&#35299;&#37322;&#21644;&#23653;&#34892;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#32780;&#21457;&#29983;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20105;&#35758;&#65292;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#21508;&#26041;&#24212;&#39318;&#20808;&#36890;&#36807;&#21451;&#22909;&#21327;&#21830;&#30340;&#26041;&#24335;&#21152;&#20197;&#35299;&#20915;&#12290;&#22914;&#26524;&#22312;&#19968;&#26041;&#21521;&#20854;&#20182;&#26041;&#21457;&#20986;&#35201;&#27714;&#21327;&#21830;&#35299;&#20915;&#30340;&#20070;&#38754;&#36890;&#30693;&#21518;30&#22825;&#20043;&#20869;&#20105;&#35758;&#20173;&#28982;&#24471;&#19981;&#21040;&#35299;&#20915;&#65292;&#21017;&#20219;&#20309;&#19968;&#26041;&#22343;&#21487;&#23558;&#26377;&#20851;&#20105;&#35758;&#25552;&#20132;&#32473;&#20301;&#20110;&#28145;&#22323;&#30340;&#20013;&#22269;&#22269;&#38469;&#32463;&#27982;&#36152;&#26131;&#20210;&#35009;&#22996;&#21592;&#20250;&#21326;&#21335;&#20998;&#20250;&#65292;&#30001;&#35813;&#20250;&#25353;&#29031;&#20013;&#22269;&#22269;&#38469;&#32463;&#27982;&#36152;&#26131;&#20210;&#35009;&#22996;&#21592;&#20250;&#20210;&#35009;&#35268;&#21017;&#20210;&#35009;&#35299;&#20915;&#12290;&#20210;&#35009;&#24212;&#22312;&#28145;&#22323;&#36827;&#34892;&#65292;&#20351;&#29992;&#20043;&#35821;&#35328;&#20026;&#20013;&#25991;&#12290;&#20210;&#35009;&#35009;&#20915;&#26159;&#32456;&#23616;&#24615;&#30340;&#65292;&#23545;&#21508;&#26041;&#22343;&#26377;&#32422;&#26463;&#21147;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">In the event of any dispute with respect
to the construction and performance of this Agreement, the Parties shall first resolve the dispute through friendly negotiations. In the
event the Parties fail to reach an agreement on the dispute within 30 days after either Party&rsquo;s request to the other Parties for
resolution of the dispute through negotiations, either Party may submit the relevant dispute to the Southern China Commission of China
International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission for arbitration, in accordance with its Arbitration Rules. The arbitration shall
be conducted in Shenzhen, and the language used in arbitration shall be Chinese. The arbitration award shall be final and binding on all
Parties.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 11; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->11<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">13.3 &#22240;&#35299;&#37322;&#21644;&#23653;&#34892;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#32780;&#21457;&#29983;&#20219;&#20309;&#20105;&#35758;&#25110;&#20219;&#20309;&#20105;&#35758;&#27491;&#22312;&#36827;&#34892;&#20210;&#35009;&#26102;&#65292;&#38500;&#20105;&#35758;&#30340;&#20107;&#39033;&#22806;&#65292;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#21508;&#26041;&#20173;&#24212;&#32487;&#32493;&#34892;&#20351;&#21508;&#33258;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20854;&#20182;&#26435;&#21033;&#24182;&#23653;&#34892;&#21508;&#33258;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20854;&#20182;&#20041;&#21153;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Upon the occurrence of any disputes arising
from the construction and performance of this Agreement or during the pending arbitration of any dispute, except for the matters under
dispute, the Parties to this Agreement shall continue to exercise their respective rights under this Agreement and perform their respective
obligations under this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>14. &#36890;&#30693;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36.15pt"><B>Notices</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">14.1 &#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#35201;&#27714;&#25110;&#21457;&#20986;&#30340;&#25152;&#26377;&#36890;&#30693;&#21644;&#20854;&#20182;&#36890;&#20449;&#24212;&#36890;&#36807;&#19987;&#20154;&#36882;&#36865;&#12289;&#25346;&#21495;&#37038;&#23492;&#12289;&#37038;&#36164;&#39044;&#20184;&#25110;&#21830;&#19994;&#24555;&#36882;&#26381;&#21153;&#30340;&#26041;&#24335;&#21457;&#21040;&#35813;&#26041;&#19979;&#21015;&#22320;&#22336;&#12290;&#27599;&#19968;&#36890;&#30693;&#36824;&#24212;&#20877;&#20197;&#30005;&#23376;&#37038;&#20214;&#36865;&#36798;&#12290;&#35813;&#31561;&#36890;&#30693;&#35270;&#20026;&#26377;&#25928;&#36865;&#36798;&#30340;&#26085;&#26399;&#25353;&#22914;&#19979;&#26041;&#24335;&#30830;&#23450;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">All notices and other communications
required or permitted to be given pursuant to this Agreement shall be delivered personally or sent by registered mail, postage prepaid,
by a commercial courier service to the address of such party set forth below. A confirmation copy of each notice shall also be sent by
E-mail. The dates on which notices shall be deemed to have been effectively given shall be determined as follows:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">14.2 &#36890;&#30693;&#22914;&#26524;&#26159;&#20197;&#19987;&#20154;&#36882;&#36865;&#12289;&#24555;&#36882;&#26381;&#21153;&#25110;&#25346;&#21495;&#37038;&#23492;&#12289;&#37038;&#36164;&#39044;&#20184;&#21457;&#20986;&#30340;&#65292;&#21017;&#20197;&#20110;&#35774;&#23450;&#20026;&#36890;&#30693;&#30340;&#22320;&#22336;&#22312;&#31614;&#25910;&#25110;&#25298;&#25910;&#20043;&#26085;&#20026;&#26377;&#25928;&#36865;&#36798;&#26085;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Notices given by personal delivery, by
courier service or by registered mail, postage prepaid, shall be deemed effectively given on the date of acceptance or refusal at the
address specified for notices.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 132pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -60pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">14.3 &#20219;&#20309;&#19968;&#26041;&#21464;&#26356;&#25509;&#25910;&#36890;&#30693;&#30340;&#22320;&#22336;&#25110;&#32852;&#31995;&#20154;&#30340;&#65292;&#24212;&#25353;&#26412;&#26465;&#35268;&#23450;&#32473;&#20854;&#20182;&#26041;&#21457;&#20986;&#36890;&#30693;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">If any Party change its address for notices
or its contact person, a notice shall be delivered to the other Parties in accordance with the terms hereof.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 12; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->12<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Pledge Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 48pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>15. &#20998;&#21106;&#24615;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Severability</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#22914;&#26524;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#26377;&#20219;&#20309;&#19968;&#26465;&#25110;&#22810;&#26465;&#35268;&#23450;&#26681;&#25454;&#20219;&#20309;&#27861;&#24459;&#25110;&#27861;&#35268;&#22312;&#20219;&#20309;&#26041;&#38754;&#34987;&#35009;&#23450;&#20026;&#26080;&#25928;&#12289;&#19981;&#21512;&#27861;&#25110;&#19981;&#21487;&#25191;&#34892;&#65292;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20854;&#20313;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&#26377;&#25928;&#24615;&#12289;&#21512;&#27861;&#24615;&#25110;&#21487;&#25191;&#34892;&#24615;&#19981;&#24212;&#22240;&#27492;&#22312;&#20219;&#20309;&#26041;&#38754;&#21463;&#21040;&#24433;&#21709;&#25110;&#25439;&#23475;&#12290;&#21508;&#26041;&#24212;&#36890;&#36807;&#35802;&#24847;&#30923;&#21830;&#65292;&#20105;&#21462;&#20197;&#27861;&#24459;&#35768;&#21487;&#20197;&#21450;&#21508;&#26041;&#26399;&#26395;&#30340;&#26368;&#22823;&#38480;&#24230;&#20869;&#26377;&#25928;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#21462;&#20195;&#37027;&#20123;&#26080;&#25928;&#12289;&#19981;&#21512;&#27861;&#25110;&#19981;&#21487;&#25191;&#34892;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#32780;&#35813;&#31561;&#26377;&#25928;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#25152;&#20135;&#29983;&#30340;&#32463;&#27982;&#25928;&#26524;&#24212;&#23613;&#21487;&#33021;&#19982;&#37027;&#20123;&#26080;&#25928;&#12289;&#19981;&#21512;&#27861;&#25110;&#19981;&#33021;&#24378;&#21046;&#25191;&#34892;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#25152;&#20135;&#29983;&#30340;&#32463;&#27982;&#25928;&#26524;&#30456;&#20284;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">In the event that one or several of the
provisions of this Agreement are found to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any aspect in accordance with any laws or regulations,
the validity, legality or enforceability of the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall not be affected or compromised in any respect.
The Parties shall strive in good faith to replace such invalid, illegal or unenforceable provisions with effective provisions that accomplish
to the greatest extent permitted by law and the intentions of the Parties, and the economic effect of such effective provisions shall
be as close as possible to the economic effect of those invalid, illegal or unenforceable provisions.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>16. &#38468;&#20214;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Attachments</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#25152;&#21015;&#38468;&#20214;&#65292;&#20026;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#19981;&#21487;&#20998;&#21106;&#30340;&#32452;&#25104;&#37096;&#20998;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">The attachments set forth herein shall
be an integral part of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>17. &#29983;&#25928;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Effectiveness</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">17.1 &#26412;&#21327;&#35758;&#32463;&#21508;&#26041;&#36866;&#24403;&#31614;&#32626;&#26102;&#29983;&#25928;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">This Agreement shall become effective
when the Parties have duly executed this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">17.2 &#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20462;&#25913;&#12289;&#34917;&#20805;&#25110;&#21464;&#26356;&#65292;&#22343;&#39035;&#37319;&#29992;&#20070;&#38754;&#24418;&#24335;&#65292;&#32463;&#21508;&#26041;&#31614;&#23383;&#25110;&#30422;&#31456;&#21518;&#29983;&#25928;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">Any amendments, changes and supplements
to this Agreement shall be in writing and shall become effective after the affixation of the signatures or seals of the Parties.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.6pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">17.3 &#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20197;&#20013;&#25991;&#21644;&#33521;&#25991;&#20070;&#23601;&#65292;&#19968;&#24335;&#19977;&#20221;&#65292;&#36136;&#26435;&#20154;&#12289;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&#21644;&#19993;&#26041;&#21508;&#25345;&#19968;&#20221;&#65292;&#20855;&#26377;&#21516;&#31561;&#25928;&#21147;&#65307;&#20013;&#33521;&#25991;&#29256;&#26412;&#22914;&#26377;&#20914;&#31361;&#65292;&#24212;&#20197;&#20013;&#25991;&#29256;&#20026;&#20934;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 24pt; text-align: justify">This Agreement is written in Chinese
and English in three copies. Pledger, Pledgee and Party C shall hold one copy respectively. Each copy of this Agreement shall have equal
validity. In case there is any conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><I>&#26412;&#39029;&#20854;&#20313;&#37096;&#20998;&#21051;&#24847;&#30041;&#20026;&#31354;&#30333;</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><I>The Remainder of this page is intentionally
left blank</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21pt">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties
have caused their authorized representatives to execute this Equity Pledge Agreement as of the date first above written.&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&#30002;&#26041;&#65306; &#20339;&#30410;&#31185;&#25216;&#65288;&#21688;&#23425;&#65289;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;</B></P>

<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>Exhibit 10.7</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><B>&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#20998;&#21512;&#21516;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: center"><B>Equity Option Agreement</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#26412;&#32929;&#26435;&#22788;&#20998;&#21512;&#21516;&#65288;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&rdquo;&#65289;&#30001;&#20197;&#19979;&#21508;&#26041;&#20110;2021&#24180;7&#26376;16&#26085;&#22312;&#20013;&#21326;&#20154;&#27665;&#20849;&#21644;&#22269;&#65288;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#20013;&#22269;&rdquo;&#65289;&#21688;&#23425;&#24066;&#31614;&#35746;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">This Equity Option Agreement
(this &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is executed by and among the following Parties as of July 16, 2021 in Xianning, the People&rsquo;s Republic
of China (&ldquo;China&rdquo; or the &ldquo;PRC&rdquo;):</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse">
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 0.75in; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&#30002;&#26041;&#65306;</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&#20339;&#30410;&#31185;&#25216;&#65288;&#21688;&#23425;&#65289;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;</B></FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#22320;&#22336;&#65306;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#28246;&#21271;&#30465;&#21688;&#23425;&#24066;&#40644;&#30024;&#26449;&#19968;&#32452;&#37329;&#33394;&#28023;&#28286;2&#24162;3&#23618;</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Party A:</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Jiayi Technologies (Xianning) Co., Ltd.</B></FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Address:</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">3/F, Building 2, Golden Bay, Group 1, Huangfan Village, Xianning City, Hubei Province</FONT></TD></TR>
  </TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; text-align: left"><B>&#20057;&#26041;&#65306;&#34081;&#26195;&#19996;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; text-align: left"><B>Party
B: Xiaodong Cai</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt"><B>&#20057;&#26041;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#20986;&#36136;&#20154;&rdquo;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.05pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.05pt"><B>Parties Bis
thereinafter referred as &ldquo;Pledger.&rdquo;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 53.95pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -53.95pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>&#19993;&#26041;&#65306;&nbsp;&#23433;&#24509;&#23433;&#30427;&#30707;&#21270;&#35774;&#22791;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in; text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.75in"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in; text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.75in"><B>Party C: Anhui
Ansheng Petrochemical Equipment Co., Ltd. </B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#20013;&#65292;&#30002;&#26041;&#12289;&#20057;&#26041;&#21644;&#19993;&#26041;&#20197;&#19979;&#21508;&#31216;&rdquo;&#19968;&#26041;&rdquo;&#65292;&#21512;&#31216;&rdquo;&#21508;&#26041;&rdquo;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">In this Agreement, each of
Party A, Party B and Party C shall be referred to as a &ldquo;Party&rdquo; respectively, and they shall be collectively referred to as
the &ldquo;Parties&rdquo;.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#37492;&#20110;&#65306;&#20057;&#26041;&#25345;&#26377;&#19993;&#26041;86.56%&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#26435;&#30410;&#12290;&#30002;&#26041;&#19982;&#19993;&#26041;&#31614;&#35746;&#20102;&#21672;&#35810;&#19982;&#26381;&#21153;&#21327;&#35758;&#12289;&#19994;&#21153;&#21512;&#20316;&#21512;&#21516;&#31561;&#19968;&#31995;&#21015;&#25511;&#21046;&#24615;&#21327;&#35758;&#65288;&rdquo;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&rdquo;&#65289;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Whereas: Party B holds 86.58%
of the equity interest in Party C. Party A and Party C have executed a Consultation and Service Agreement, Business Cooperation Agreement
and other control agreements (the &ldquo;Control Agreements&rdquo;).</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#29616;&#21508;&#26041;&#21327;&#21830;&#19968;&#33268;&#65292;&#36798;&#25104;&#22914;&#19979;&#21327;&#35758;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Now therefore, upon mutual
discussion and negotiation, the Parties have reached the following agreement:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>1. &#32929;&#26435;&#20080;&#21334;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21pt"><B>Sale and Purchase
of Equity Interest</B></P>



<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.1 &#25480;&#20104;&#26435;&#21033;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Option Granted</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#37492;&#20110;&#30002;&#26041;&#21521;&#20057;&#26041;&#25903;&#20184;&#20102;&#20154;&#27665;&#24065;1&#20803;&#20316;&#20026;&#23545;&#20215;&#65292;&#19988;&#20057;&#26041;&#30830;&#35748;&#25910;&#21040;&#24182;&#35748;&#20026;&#35813;&#23545;&#20215;&#36275;&#22815;&#65292;&#20057;&#26041;&#22312;&#27492;&#19981;&#21487;&#25764;&#38144;&#22320;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#22312;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#20801;&#35768;&#30340;&#21069;&#25552;&#19979;&#65292;&#30002;&#26041;&#21487;&#20197;&#25353;&#29031;&#33258;&#34892;&#20915;&#23450;&#30340;&#34892;&#20351;&#27493;&#39588;&#65292;&#24182;&#25353;&#29031;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31532;1.3&#26465;&#25152;&#36848;&#30340;&#20215;&#26684;&#65292;&#35201;&#27714;&#20057;&#26041;&#23653;&#34892;&#21644;&#23436;&#25104;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#35201;&#27714;&#30340;&#19968;&#20999;&#23457;&#25209;&#21644;&#30331;&#35760;&#25163;&#32493;&#65292;&#20351;&#24471;&#30002;&#26041;&#21487;&#20197;&#38543;&#26102;&#19968;&#27425;&#25110;&#22810;&#27425;&#20174;&#20057;&#26041;&#36141;&#20080;&#65292;&#25110;&#25351;&#23450;&#19968;&#20154;&#25110;&#22810;&#20154;(&ldquo;&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&rdquo;)&#20174;&#20057;&#26041;&#36141;&#20080;&#20057;&#26041;&#25152;&#25345;&#26377;&#30340;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#19981;&#36229;&#36807;66%&#32929;&#26435;&nbsp;(&ldquo;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&rdquo;)&#12290;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#35813;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#20026;&#29420;&#23478;&#30340;&#12290;&#38500;&#30002;&#26041;&#21644;&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&#22806;&#65292;&#20219;&#20309;&#31532;&#19977;&#20154;&#22343;&#19981;&#24471;&#20139;&#26377;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#25110;&#20854;&#20182;&#19982;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#26377;&#20851;&#30340;&#26435;&#21033;&#12290;&#19993;&#26041;&#29305;&#27492;&#21516;&#24847;&#20057;&#26041;&#21521;&#30002;&#26041;&#25480;&#20104;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#12290;&#26412;&#27454;&#21450;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#25152;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&rdquo;&#20154;&rdquo;&#25351;&#20010;&#20154;&#12289;&#20844;&#21496;&#12289;&#21512;&#33829;&#20225;&#19994;&#12289;&#21512;&#20249;&#12289;&#20225;&#19994;&#12289;&#20449;&#25176;&#25110;&#38750;&#20844;&#21496;&#32452;&#32455;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">In consideration of the payment
of RMB 1 by Party A, the receipt and adequacy of which is hereby acknowledged by Party B, Party B hereby irrevocably agrees that, on the
condition that it is permitted by the PRC laws, Party A has the right to require Party B to fulfill and complete all approval and registration
procedures required under PRC laws for Party A to purchase, or designate one or more persons (each, a &ldquo;Designee&rdquo;) to purchase,
Party up to 66% of B&rsquo;s equity interests in Party C, once or at multiple times at any time in part or in whole at Party A&rsquo;s
sole and absolute discretion and at the price described in Section 1.3 herein (such right being the &ldquo;Equity Interest Purchase Option&rdquo;).
Party A&rsquo;s Equity Interest Purchase Option shall be exclusive. Except for Party A and the Designee(s), no other person shall be entitled
to the Equity Interest Purchase Option or other rights with respect to the equity interests of Party B. Party C hereby agrees to the grant
by Party B of the Equity Interest Purchase Option to Party A. The term &ldquo;person&rdquo; as used herein shall refer to individuals,
corporations, partnerships, partners, enterprises, trusts or non-corporate organizations.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.2 &#34892;&#20351;&#27493;&#39588;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Steps for Exercise of Equity
Interest Purchase Option</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 6pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#30002;&#26041;&#34892;&#20351;&#20854;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#20197;&#31526;&#21512;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#21644;&#27861;&#35268;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#20026;&#21069;&#25552;&#12290;&#30002;&#26041;&#34892;&#20351;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#26102;&#65292;&#24212;&#21521;&#20057;&#26041;&#21457;&#20986;&#20070;&#38754;&#36890;&#30693;(&ldquo;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#36890;&#30693;&rdquo;)&#65292;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#36890;&#30693;&#24212;&#36733;&#26126;&#20197;&#19979;&#20107;&#39033;&#65306;(a)&#30002;&#26041;&#20851;&#20110;&#34892;&#20351;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#30340;&#20915;&#23450;&#65307;(b)&#30002;&#26041;&#25311;&#20174;&#20057;&#26041;&#36141;&#20080;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#20221;&#39069;(&ldquo;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&rdquo;)&nbsp;&#65307;&#21644;(c)&nbsp;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#36141;&#20080;&#26085;/&#36716;&#35753;&#26085;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Subject to the provisions
of the laws and regulations of China, Party A may exercise the Equity Interest Purchase Option by issuing a written notice to Party B
(the &ldquo;Equity Interest Purchase Option Notice&rdquo;), specifying: (a) Party A&rsquo;s decision to exercise the Equity Interest Purchase
Option; (b) the portion of equity interests to be purchased from Party B (the &ldquo;Optioned Interests&rdquo;); and (c) the date for
purchasing the Optioned Interests and/or the date for transfer of the Optioned Interests.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 2; Options: NewSection; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->2<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Option Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.3 &#32929;&#26435;&#20080;&#20215;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Equity Interest Purchase
Price</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#20080;&#20215;&#65288;&rdquo;&#22522;&#20934;&#20080;&#20215;&rdquo;&#65289;&#24212;&#20026;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#25152;&#20801;&#35768;&#30340;&#26368;&#20302;&#20215;&#26684;&#12290;&#22914;&#26524;&#22312;&#30002;&#26041;&#34892;&#26435;&#26102;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#35201;&#27714;&#35780;&#20272;&#32929;&#26435;&#65292;&#21508;&#26041;&#36890;&#36807;&#35802;&#20449;&#21407;&#21017;&#21478;&#34892;&#21830;&#23450;&#65292;&#24182;&#22312;&#35780;&#20272;&#22522;&#30784;&#19978;&#23545;&#35813;&#32929;&#26435;&#20080;&#20215;&#36827;&#34892;&#24517;&#35201;&#35843;&#25972;&#65292;&#20197;&#31526;&#21512;&#24403;&#26102;&#36866;&#29992;&#20043;&#20219;&#20309;&#20013;&#22269;&#27861;&#24459;&#20043;&#35201;&#27714;&#65288;&#32479;&#31216;&#65292;&rdquo;&#32929;&#26435;&#20080;&#20215;&rdquo;&#65289;&#12290;&#22914;&#26524;&#24403;&#22522;&#20934;&#20080;&#20215;&#39640;&#20110;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#27880;&#20876;&#36164;&#26412;&#26102;&#65288;&#33509;&#38750;&#36141;&#20080;&#20840;&#37096;&#32929;&#26435;&#26102;&#65292;&#25353;&#27604;&#20363;&#35745;&#31639;&#65289;&#65292;&#20057;&#26041;&#24212;&#25353;&#29031;&#30002;&#26041;&#25351;&#23450;&#30340;&#26041;&#24335;&#23558;&#39640;&#20986;&#37096;&#20998;&#36820;&#36824;&#32473;&#30002;&#26041;&#25110;&#20854;&#25351;&#23450;&#30340;&#20154;&#22763;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">The purchase price of the
Optioned Interests (the &ldquo;Base Price&rdquo;) shall be the lowest price allowed by the laws of China. If appraisal is required by
the laws of China at the time when Party A exercises the Equity Interest Purchase Option, the Parties shall negotiate in good faith and
based on the appraisal result make necessary adjustment to the Equity Interest Purchase Price so that it complies with any and all then
applicable laws of China (collectively, the &ldquo;Equity Interest Purchase Price&rdquo;). When the price is higher than the registered
capital of Party C, calculated pro rata for purchase of less than all of the Equity Interest, the excessive part of the price shall be
returned to Party A or its designee in a manner as instructed by Party A.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.4 &#36716;&#35753;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Transfer of Optioned Interests</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#30002;&#26041;&#27599;&#27425;&#34892;&#20351;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#26102;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">For each exercise of the
Equity Interest Purchase Option:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.55pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.4.1 &#20057;&#26041;&#24212;&#36131;&#25104;&#19993;&#26041;&#21450;&#26102;&#21484;&#24320;&#32929;&#19996;&#20250;&#20250;&#35758;&#65292;&#22312;&#35813;&#20250;&#35758;&#19978;&#65292;&#24212;&#36890;&#36807;&#25209;&#20934;&#20057;&#26041;&#21521;&#30002;&#26041;&#21644;/&#25110;&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&#36716;&#35753;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#20915;&#35758;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B shall cause Party
C to promptly convene a shareholders&rsquo; meeting, at which a resolution shall be adopted approving Party B&rsquo;s transfer of the
Optioned Interests to Party A and/or the Designee(s);</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.4.2 &#20057;&#26041;&#24212;&#23601;&#20854;&#21521;&#30002;&#26041;&#21644;/&#25110;&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&#36716;&#35753;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&#21462;&#24471;&#19993;&#26041;&#20854;&#20182;&#32929;&#19996;&#21516;&#24847;&#35813;&#36716;&#35753;&#24182;&#25918;&#24323;&#20248;&#20808;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#30340;&#20070;&#38754;&#22768;&#26126;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B shall obtain written
statements from the other shareholders of Party C giving consent to the transfer of the equity interest to Party A and/or the Designee(s)
and waiving any right of first refusal related thereto.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 84pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.4.3 &#20057;&#26041;&#24212;&#19982;&#30002;&#26041;&#21644;/&#25110;&nbsp;(&#22312;&#36866;&#29992;&#30340;&#24773;&#20917;&#19979;)&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&#25353;&#29031;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#21450;&#32929;&#26435;&#36141;&#20080;&#36890;&#30693;&#30340;&#35268;&#23450;&#65292;&#20026;&#27599;&#27425;&#36716;&#35753;&#31614;&#35746;&#32929;&#26435;&#36716;&#35753;&#21512;&#21516;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B shall execute a share
transfer contract with respect to each transfer with Party A and/or each Designee (whichever is applicable), in accordance with the provisions
of this Agreement and the Equity Interest Purchase Option Notice regarding the Optioned Interests;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 3; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->3<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Option Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">1.4.4 &#26377;&#20851;&#26041;&#24212;&#31614;&#32626;&#25152;&#26377;&#20854;&#20182;&#25152;&#38656;&#21512;&#21516;&#12289;&#21327;&#35758;&#25110;&#25991;&#20214;&#65292;&#21462;&#24471;&#20840;&#37096;&#25152;&#38656;&#30340;&#25919;&#24220;&#25209;&#20934;&#21644;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#24182;&#37319;&#21462;&#25152;&#26377;&#25152;&#38656;&#34892;&#21160;&#65292;&#22312;&#19981;&#38468;&#24102;&#20219;&#20309;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&#30340;&#24773;&#20917;&#19979;&#65292;&#23558;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#26377;&#25928;&#25152;&#26377;&#26435;&#36716;&#31227;&#32473;&#30002;&#26041;&#21644;/&#25110;&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&#24182;&#20351;&#30002;&#26041;&#21644;/&#25110;&#34987;&#25351;&#23450;&#20154;&#25104;&#20026;&#34987;&#36141;&#20080;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#30331;&#35760;&#22312;&#20876;&#25152;&#26377;&#20154;&#12290;&#20026;&#26412;&#27454;&#21450;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#30446;&#30340;&#65292;&rdquo;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&rdquo;&#21253;&#25324;&#25285;&#20445;&#12289;&#25269;&#25276;&#12289;&#31532;&#19977;&#26041;&#26435;&#21033;&#25110;&#26435;&#30410;&#65292;&#20219;&#20309;&#36141;&#32929;&#26435;&#12289;&#25910;&#36141;&#26435;&#12289;&#20248;&#20808;&#36141;&#20080;&#26435;&#12289;&#25269;&#38144;&#26435;&#12289;&#25152;&#26377;&#26435;&#25187;&#30041;&#25110;&#20854;&#20182;&#25285;&#20445;&#23433;&#25490;&#31561;&#65307;&#20294;&#20026;&#20102;&#26126;&#30830;&#36215;&#35265;&#65292;&#19981;&#21253;&#25324;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#12289;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&#39033;&#19979;&#20135;&#29983;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&#12290;&#26412;&#27454;&#21450;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#25152;&#35268;&#23450;&#30340;&rdquo;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&rdquo;&#25351;&#30002;&#26041;&#12289;&#20057;&#26041;&#21644;&#19993;&#26041;&#20110;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31614;&#32626;&#20043;&#26085;&#31614;&#35746;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&#65288;&#19979;&#31216;&rdquo;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&rdquo;&#65289;&#65292;&#26681;&#25454;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&#65292;&#20057;&#26041;&#20026;&#25285;&#20445;&#19993;&#26041;&#33021;&#23653;&#34892;&#19993;&#26041;&#19982;&#30002;&#26041;&#31614;&#35746;&#30340;&#25511;&#21046;&#21327;&#35758;&#39033;&#19979;&#30340;&#20041;&#21153;&#65292;&#32780;&#21521;&#30002;&#26041;&#36136;&#25276;&#20854;&#22312;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#20840;&#37096;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">The relevant Parties shall
execute all other necessary contracts, agreements or documents, obtain all necessary government licenses and permits and take all necessary
actions to transfer valid ownership of the Optioned Interests to Party A and/or the Designee(s), unencumbered by any security interests,
and cause Party A and/or the Designee(s) to become the registered owner(s) of the Optioned Interests. For the purpose of this Section
and this Agreement, &ldquo;security interests&rdquo; shall include securities, mortgages, third party&rsquo;s rights or interests, any
stock options, acquisition right, right of first refusal, right to offset, ownership retention or other security arrangements, but shall
be deemed to exclude any security interest created by this Agreement and Party B&rsquo;s Equity Pledge Agreement. &ldquo;Party B&rsquo;s
Equity Pledge Agreement&rdquo; as used in this Section and this Agreement shall refer to the Equity Pledge Agreement (&ldquo;Party B&rsquo;s
Equity Pledge Agreement&rdquo;) executed by and among Party A, Party B and Party C as of the date hereof, whereby Party B pledges all
of its equity interests in Party C to Party A, in order to guarantee Party C&rsquo;s performance of its obligations under the Control
Agreements executed by and between Party C and Party A.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>2. &#25215;&#35834;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt"><B>Covenants</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 24.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1 &#26377;&#20851;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#25215;&#35834;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Covenants regarding Party
C</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#20057;&#26041;&#65288;&#20316;&#20026;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#32929;&#19996;&#65289;&#21644;&#19993;&#26041;&#22312;&#27492;&#25215;&#35834;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 19.05pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 30.6pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B (as the shareholders
of Party C) and Party C hereby covenant as follows:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 49.65pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.1 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#20197;&#20219;&#20309;&#24418;&#24335;&#34917;&#20805;&#12289;&#26356;&#25913;&#25110;&#20462;&#25913;&#19993;&#26041;&#20844;&#21496;&#31456;&#31243;&#25991;&#20214;&#65292;&#22686;&#21152;&#25110;&#20943;&#23569;&#20854;&#27880;&#20876;&#36164;&#26412;&#65292;&#25110;&#20197;&#20854;&#20182;&#26041;&#24335;&#25913;&#21464;&#20854;&#27880;&#20876;&#36164;&#26412;&#32467;&#26500;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall not in any manner supplement, change or amend the articles of association and bylaws of Party C, increase
or decrease its registered capital, or change its structure of registered capital in other manners;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 4; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->4<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Option Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.2 &#25353;&#29031;&#33391;&#22909;&#30340;&#36130;&#21153;&#21644;&#21830;&#19994;&#26631;&#20934;&#21450;&#24815;&#20363;&#65292;&#20445;&#25345;&#20854;&#20844;&#21496;&#30340;&#23384;&#32493;&#65292;&#23457;&#24910;&#22320;&#21450;&#26377;&#25928;&#22320;&#32463;&#33829;&#20854;&#19994;&#21153;&#21644;&#22788;&#29702;&#20107;&#21153;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">They shall maintain Party
C&rsquo;s corporate existence in accordance with good financial and business standards and practices by prudently and effectively operating
its business and handling its affairs;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.3 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#22312;&#26412;&#21512;&#21516;&#31614;&#32626;&#20043;&#26085;&#36215;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#26102;&#38388;&#20986;&#21806;&#12289;&#36716;&#35753;&#12289;&#25269;&#25276;&#25110;&#20197;&#20854;&#20182;&#26041;&#24335;&#22788;&#32622;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#36164;&#20135;&#12289;&#19994;&#21153;&#25110;&#25910;&#20837;&#30340;&#21512;&#27861;&#25110;&#21463;&#30410;&#26435;&#30410;&#65292;&#25110;&#20801;&#35768;&#22312;&#20854;&#19978;&#35774;&#32622;&#20219;&#20309;&#20854;&#20182;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall not at any time following the date hereof, sell, transfer, mortgage or dispose of in any manner any assets
of Party C or legal or beneficial interest in the business or revenues of Party C, or allow the encumbrance thereon of any security interest;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.4 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#21457;&#29983;&#12289;&#32487;&#25215;&#12289;&#20445;&#35777;&#25110;&#23481;&#35768;&#23384;&#22312;&#20219;&#20309;&#20538;&#21153;&#65292;&#20294;(i)&#27491;&#24120;&#25110;&#26085;&#24120;&#19994;&#21153;&#36807;&#31243;&#20013;&#20135;&#29983;&#32780;&#19981;&#26159;&#36890;&#36807;&#20511;&#27454;&#26041;&#24335;&#20135;&#29983;&#30340;&#20538;&#21153;&#65307;&#21644;(ii)&#24050;&#21521;&#30002;&#26041;&#25259;&#38706;&#21644;&#24471;&#21040;&#30002;&#26041;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#30340;&#20538;&#21153;&#38500;&#22806;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall not incur, inherit, guarantee or suffer the existence of any debt, except for (i) debts incurred in the
ordinary course of business other than through loans; and (ii) debts disclosed to Party A for which Party A&rsquo;s written consent has
been obtained;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.5 &#19968;&#30452;&#22312;&#27491;&#24120;&#19994;&#21153;&#36807;&#31243;&#20013;&#32463;&#33829;&#25152;&#26377;&#19994;&#21153;&#65292;&#20197;&#20445;&#25345;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#36164;&#20135;&#20215;&#20540;&#65292;&#19981;&#36827;&#34892;&#20219;&#20309;&#36275;&#20197;&#24433;&#21709;&#20854;&#32463;&#33829;&#29366;&#20917;&#21644;&#36164;&#20135;&#20215;&#20540;&#30340;&#20316;&#20026;/&#19981;&#20316;&#20026;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">They shall always operate
all of Party C&rsquo;s businesses during the ordinary course of business to maintain the asset value of Party C and refrain from any action/omission
that may affect Party C&rsquo;s operating status and asset value;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.6 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#24471;&#35753;&#19993;&#26041;&#31614;&#35746;&#20219;&#20309;&#37325;&#22823;&#21512;&#21516;&#65292;&#20294;&#22312;&#27491;&#24120;&#19994;&#21153;&#36807;&#31243;&#20013;&#31614;&#35746;&#30340;&#21512;&#21516;&#38500;&#22806;(&#23601;&#26412;&#27573;&#32780;&#35328;&#65292;&#22914;&#26524;&#19968;&#20221;&#21512;&#21516;&#30340;&#24635;&#37329;&#39069;&#36229;&#36807;&#20154;&#27665;&#24065;100,000&#20803;&#65292;&#21363;&#34987;&#35270;&#20026;&#37325;&#22823;&#21512;&#21516;)&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall not cause Party C to execute any major contract, except the contracts in the ordinary course of business
(for purpose of this subsection, a contract with a price exceeding RMB 100,000 shall be deemed a major contract);</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.7 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19993;&#26041;&#19981;&#24471;&#21521;&#20219;&#20309;&#20154;&#25552;&#20379;&#36151;&#27454;&#25110;&#20449;&#36151;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall not cause Party C to provide any person with any loan or credit;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 5; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->5<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Option Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.8 &#24212;&#30002;&#26041;&#35201;&#27714;&#65292;&#21521;&#20854;&#25552;&#20379;&#25152;&#26377;&#20851;&#20110;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#33829;&#36816;&#21644;&#36130;&#21153;&#29366;&#20917;&#30340;&#36164;&#26009;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">They shall provide Party
A with information on Party C&rsquo;s business operations and financial condition at Party A&rsquo;s request;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.9 &#22914;&#30002;&#26041;&#25552;&#20986;&#35201;&#27714;&#65292;&#19993;&#26041;&#24212;&#20174;&#30002;&#26041;&#25509;&#21463;&#30340;&#20445;&#38505;&#20844;&#21496;&#22788;&#36141;&#20080;&#21644;&#25345;&#26377;&#26377;&#20851;&#20854;&#36164;&#20135;&#21644;&#19994;&#21153;&#30340;&#20445;&#38505;&#65292;&#35813;&#20445;&#38505;&#30340;&#37329;&#39069;&#21644;&#38505;&#31181;&#24212;&#19982;&#32463;&#33829;&#31867;&#20284;&#19994;&#21153;&#30340;&#20844;&#21496;&#19968;&#33268;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">If requested by Party A,
they shall procure and maintain insurance in respect of Party C&rsquo;s assets and business from an insurance carrier acceptable to Party
A, at an amount and type of coverage typical for companies that operate similar businesses;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.10 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19993;&#26041;&#19981;&#24471;&#19982;&#20219;&#20309;&#20154;&#21512;&#24182;&#25110;&#32852;&#21512;&#65292;&#25110;&#23545;&#20219;&#20309;&#20154;&#36827;&#34892;&#25910;&#36141;&#25110;&#25237;&#36164;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall not cause or permit Party C to merge, consolidate with, acquire or invest in any person;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.11 &#23558;&#21457;&#29983;&#30340;&#25110;&#21487;&#33021;&#21457;&#29983;&#30340;&#19982;&#19993;&#26041;&#36164;&#20135;&#12289;&#19994;&#21153;&#25110;&#25910;&#20837;&#26377;&#20851;&#30340;&#35785;&#35772;&#12289;&#20210;&#35009;&#25110;&#34892;&#25919;&#31243;&#24207;&#31435;&#21363;&#36890;&#30693;&#30002;&#26041;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.1pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">They shall immediately notify
Party A of the occurrence or possible occurrence of any litigation, arbitration or administrative proceedings relating to Party C&rsquo;s
assets, business or revenue;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.12 &#20026;&#20445;&#25345;&#19993;&#26041;&#23545;&#20854;&#20840;&#37096;&#36164;&#20135;&#30340;&#25152;&#26377;&#26435;&#65292;&#31614;&#32626;&#25152;&#26377;&#24517;&#35201;&#25110;&#36866;&#24403;&#30340;&#25991;&#20214;&#65292;&#37319;&#21462;&#25152;&#26377;&#24517;&#35201;&#25110;&#36866;&#24403;&#30340;&#34892;&#21160;&#21644;&#25552;&#20986;&#25152;&#26377;&#24517;&#35201;&#25110;&#36866;&#24403;&#30340;&#25511;&#21578;&#25110;&#23545;&#25152;&#26377;&#32034;&#20607;&#36827;&#34892;&#24517;&#35201;&#21644;&#36866;&#24403;&#30340;&#25239;&#36777;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">To maintain the ownership
by Party C of all of its assets, they shall execute all necessary or appropriate documents, take all necessary or appropriate actions
and file all necessary or appropriate complaints or raise necessary and appropriate defenses against all claims;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.13 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#24471;&#20197;&#20219;&#20309;&#24418;&#24335;&#27966;&#21457;&#32929;&#24687;&#20104;&#21508;&#32929;&#19996;&#65292;&#20294;&#19968;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#35201;&#27714;&#65292;&#19993;&#26041;&#24212;&#31435;&#21363;&#23558;&#20854;&#25152;&#26377;&#21487;&#20998;&#37197;&#21033;&#28070;&#20840;&#37096;&#31435;&#21363;&#20998;&#37197;&#32473;&#20854;&#21508;&#32929;&#19996;&#65307;&#21450;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, they shall ensure that Party C shall not in any manner distribute dividends to its shareholders, provided that upon
Party A&rsquo;s written request, Party C shall immediately distribute all distributable profits to its shareholders; and</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.1.14 &#26681;&#25454;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#35201;&#27714;&#65292;&#22996;&#20219;&#30001;&#20854;&#25351;&#23450;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20154;&#22763;&#20986;&#20219;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#33891;&#20107;&#65307;&#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#24471;&#26356;&#25442;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#33891;&#20107;&#12290;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">At the request of Party A,
they shall appoint any persons designated by Party A as directors of Party C; without the prior written consent of Party A, they shall
not replace the directors of Party C.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 6; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->6<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">Equity Option Agreement</P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.2 &#20057;&#26041;&#30340;&#25215;&#35834;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Covenants of Party B</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 21.2pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">&#20057;&#26041;&#25215;&#35834;&#65306;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.7in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B hereby covenants
as follows:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.7in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.2.1 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#65292;&#19981;&#20986;&#21806;&#12289;&#36716;&#35753;&#12289;&#25269;&#25276;&#25110;&#20197;&#20854;&#20182;&#26041;&#24335;&#22788;&#32622;&#20854;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#21512;&#27861;&#25110;&#21463;&#30410;&#26435;&#30410;&#65292;&#25110;&#20801;&#35768;&#22312;&#20854;&#19978;&#35774;&#32622;&#20219;&#20309;&#20854;&#20182;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&#65292;&#20294;&#26681;&#25454;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&#22312;&#35813;&#32929;&#26435;&#19978;&#35774;&#32622;&#30340;&#36136;&#25276;&#21017;&#38500;&#22806;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Without the prior written
consent of Party A, Party B shall not sell, transfer, mortgage or dispose of in any other manner any legal or beneficial interest in the
equity interests in Party C held by Party B, or allow the encumbrance thereon of any security interest, except for the pledge placed on
these equity interests in accordance with Party B&rsquo;s Equity Pledge Agreement;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.2.2 &#20419;&#20351;&#19993;&#26041;&#32929;&#19996;&#20250;&#21644;/&#25110;&#33891;&#20107;&#20250;&#19981;&#25209;&#20934;&#22312;&#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#30340;&#24773;&#20917;&#19979;&#65292;&#20986;&#21806;&#12289;&#36716;&#35753;&#12289;&#25269;&#25276;&#25110;&#20197;&#20854;&#20182;&#26041;&#24335;&#22788;&#32622;&#20219;&#20309;&#20057;&#26041;&#25345;&#26377;&#20043;&#19993;&#26041;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#21512;&#27861;&#26435;&#30410;&#25110;&#21463;&#30410;&#26435;&#65292;&#25110;&#20801;&#35768;&#22312;&#20854;&#19978;&#35774;&#32622;&#20219;&#20309;&#20854;&#20182;&#25285;&#20445;&#26435;&#30410;&#65292;&#20294;&#25209;&#20934;&#26681;&#25454;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#36136;&#25276;&#21512;&#21516;&#22312;&#20057;&#26041;&#32929;&#26435;&#19978;&#35774;&#32622;&#30340;&#36136;&#25276;&#21017;&#38500;&#22806;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B shall cause the shareholders&rsquo;
meeting and/or the board of directors of Party C not to approve the sale, transfer, mortgage or disposition in any other manner of any
legal or beneficial interest in the equity interests in Party C held by Party B, or allow the encumbrance thereon of any security interest,
without the prior written consent of Party A, except for the pledge placed on these equity interests in accordance with Party B&rsquo;s
Equity Pledge Agreement;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.2.3 &#26410;&#32463;&#30002;&#26041;&#30340;&#20107;&#20808;&#20070;&#38754;&#21516;&#24847;&#30340;&#24773;&#20917;&#19979;&#65292;&#23545;&#20110;&#19993;&#26041;&#19982;&#20219;&#20309;&#20154;&#21512;&#24182;&#25110;&#32852;&#21512;&#65292;&#25110;&#23545;&#20219;&#20309;&#20154;&#36827;&#34892;&#25910;&#36141;&#25110;&#25237;&#36164;&#65292;&#20057;&#26041;&#23558;&#20419;&#25104;&#19993;&#26041;&#32929;&#19996;&#20250;&#25110;&#33891;&#20107;&#20250;&#19981;&#20104;&#25209;&#20934;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 21.3pt">Party B shall cause the shareholders&rsquo;
meeting or the board of directors of Party C not to approve the merger or consolidation with any person, or the acquisition of or investment
in any person, without the prior written consent of Party A;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 85.05pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">2.2.4 &#23558;&#21457;&#29983;&#30340;&#25110;&#21487;&#33021;&#21457;&#29983;&#30340;&#20219;&#20309;&#20851;&#20110;&#20854;&#25152;&#25317;&#26377;&#30340;&#32929;&#26435;&#30340;&#35785;&#35772;&#12289;&#20210;&#35009;&#25110;&#34892;&#25919;&#31243;&#24207;&#31435;&#21363;&#36890;&#30693;&#30002;&#26041;&#65307;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>
